MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG5 postcode area of Dalbeattie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:21pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:07pm on the 10th of March 2021.
